urls.title: PAENG ADVISORY NO. 5
urls.description: The aviation authorities have reopened Manila’s Ninoy Aquino International Airport (NAIA) for airline operations from 10 PM of October 29 (local Philippine time). As a result, we will be able to operate flights departing Manila for the U.S., Australia and Canada, although with some delays as we finalize operational requirements: PR 104 Manila-San Francisco – Departing at 01:00 AM, October 30 PR 209 Manila-Melbourne – Departing at 01:00 AM, October 30 PR 221 Manila-Brisbane – Departing at 01:00 AM,

data.text: @Super_Juniora25 Hi. Please adjust your settings on Twitter so we can send you a direct message. Thank you.

Thank you.

@kathalquiros We sent you a DM. Please check your inbox.
@mylenet If your contact details are in our reservations records, you will be informed of the status of your flights via e-mail, telephone call or SMS/text.

On the other hand, may we know your concern? And we'll do our best to assist you.
